alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Gosper (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 5:58PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN GOSPER AND SOUTH CENTRAL DAWSON COUNTIES THROUGH 630 PM CDT... At 557 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Johnson Lake, or 8 miles west of Lexington, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Johnson Lake around 605 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Elwood. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 221 and 238. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for south central Nebraska.
